description: This file defines a Next.js page component for product details, including static parameter generation for static site generation and a server component that renders a client component with dynamic parameters.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Generates a static list of product IDs for static site generation, producing 12 IDs from '1' to '12'.

methods.name: ProductDetailPage
methods.description: A server component that receives route parameters and renders a client component 'ClientProductDetail' passing the product ID.
